blocks.name: df-homa
blocks.content: Definition of the hom-set extractor for arrows, which tags the morphisms of the underlying hom-set with domain and codomain, which can then be extracted using ~ df-doma and ~ df-coda . (Contributed by FL, 6-May-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 11-Jan-2017.)

blocks.name: df-arw
blocks.content: Definition of the set of arrows of a category. We will use the term "arrow" to denote a morphism tagged with its domain and codomain, as opposed to ` Hom ` , which allows hom-sets for distinct objects to overlap. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Jan-2017.)

blocks.name: homarcl
blocks.content: Reverse closure for an arrow. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Jan-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm homarcl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, c2, c3)), wcel(c4, ccat))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(choma, c4))
} = {
  nsyl2(wcel(c0, co(c1, c2, c3)), wcel(c4, ccat), wceq(co(c1, c2, c3), emptycls))
  n0i(c0, co(c1, c2, c3))
  syl6eq(co(c1, c2, c3), emptycls, co(c1, emptycls, c3), wn(wcel(c4, ccat)))
  oveqd(c1, c2, c3, emptycls, wn(wcel(c4, ccat)))
  syl5eq(c2, emptycls, cfv(choma, c4), wn(wcel(c4, ccat)))
  fvmptndm(hs0, c4, ccat, choma, cmpt(hs1, cxp(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))), cxp(csn(cv(hs1)), cfv(cfv(chom, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)))))
  df-homa(hs0, hs1)
  0ov(c1, c3)
  diff.hs0.c(ccat)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm homarcl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈(c1[c2]c3)→ c4 ∈ Cat)
  ⊣ c2 =(HomA ` c4)
} = {
  nsyl2(c0 ∈(c1[c2]c3), c4 ∈ Cat, (c1[c2]c3)= ∅)
  n0i(c0, (c1[c2]c3))
  syl6eq((c1[c2]c3), emptycls, (c1[∅]c3), ¬ c4 ∈ Cat)
  oveqd(c1, c2, c3, emptycls, ¬ c4 ∈ Cat)
  syl5eq(c2, emptycls, (HomA ` c4), ¬ c4 ∈ Cat)
  fvmptndm(hs0, c4, ccat, choma, (hs1 ∈((Base ` hs0)×(Base ` hs0))↦({ hs1 } ×((Hom ` hs0)` hs1))))
  df-homa(hs0, hs1)
  0ov(c1, c3)
  diff.hs0.c(ccat)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
}

blocks.name: homafval
blocks.content: Value of the disjointified hom-set function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Jan-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm homafval(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, cxp(c1, c1), cxp(csn(cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(s0))))))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(choma, c3))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, ccat))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(chom, c3))
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, cxp(c1, c1), cxp(csn(cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(s0)))))), diffsw(s0, w0))
  syl5eq(c0, cmpt(s0, cxp(c1, c1), cxp(csn(cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(s0)))), cfv(choma, c3), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(cfv(choma, c3), cmpt(s0, cxp(c1, c1), cxp(csn(cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(s0))))), wcel(c3, ccat))
  fvmpt(hs0, c3, ccat, choma, cmpt(s0, cxp(c1, c1), cxp(csn(cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(s0)))), cmpt(s0, cxp(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))), cxp(csn(cv(s0)), cfv(cfv(chom, cv(hs0)), cv(s0)))))
  mpteq12dv(s0, cxp(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))), cxp(csn(cv(s0)), cfv(cfv(chom, cv(hs0)), cv(s0))), cxp(c1, c1), cxp(csn(cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(s0))), wceq(cv(hs0), c3))
  sqxpeqd(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c3))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), c1, cfv(cbs, c3), wceq(cv(hs0), c3))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c3, cbs)
  xpeq2d(csn(cv(s0)), cfv(cfv(chom, cv(hs0)), cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c3))
  fveq1d(cfv(chom, cv(hs0)), cv(s0), c2, wceq(cv(hs0), c3))
  syl6eqr(cfv(chom, cv(hs0)), c2, cfv(chom, c3), wceq(cv(hs0), c3))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c3, chom)
  df-homa(hs0, s0)
  mptex(s0, cxp(c1, c1), cxp(csn(cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(s0))))
  xpex(c1, c1)
  fvexi(c1, cbs, c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(ccat)
  diff.hs0.c(cmpt(s0, cxp(c1, c1), cxp(csn(cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(s0)))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c3)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cxp.s(s0, c1, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm homafval(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 =(s0 ∈(c1 × c1)↦({ s0 } ×(c2 ` s0))))
  ⊣ c0 =(HomA ` c3)
  ⊣ c1 =(Base ` c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ Cat)
  ⊣ c2 =(Hom ` c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  a1ii((w0 → c0 =(s0 ∈(c1 × c1)↦({ s0 } ×(c2 ` s0)))), d(s0, w0))
  syl5eq(c0, (s0 ∈(c1 × c1)↦({ s0 } ×(c2 ` s0))), (HomA ` c3), w0)
  syl(w0, (HomA ` c3)=(s0 ∈(c1 × c1)↦({ s0 } ×(c2 ` s0))), c3 ∈ Cat)
  fvmpt(hs0, c3, ccat, choma, (s0 ∈(c1 × c1)↦({ s0 } ×(c2 ` s0))), (s0 ∈((Base ` hs0)×(Base ` hs0))↦({ s0 } ×((Hom ` hs0)` s0))))
  mpteq12dv(s0, ((Base ` hs0)×(Base ` hs0)), ({ s0 } ×((Hom ` hs0)` s0)), (c1 × c1), ({ s0 } ×(c2 ` s0)), hs0 = c3)
  sqxpeqd((Base ` hs0), c1, hs0 = c3)
  syl6eqr((Base ` hs0), c1, (Base ` c3), hs0 = c3)
  fveq2(hs0, c3, cbs)
  xpeq2d({ s0 }, ((Hom ` hs0)` s0), (c2 ` s0), hs0 = c3)
  fveq1d((Hom ` hs0), s0, c2, hs0 = c3)
  syl6eqr((Hom ` hs0), c2, (Hom ` c3), hs0 = c3)
  fveq2(hs0, c3, chom)
  df-homa(hs0, s0)
  mptex(s0, (c1 × c1), ({ s0 } ×(c2 ` s0)))
  xpex(c1, c1)
  fvexi(c1, cbs, c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(ccat)
  diff.hs0.c((s0 ∈(c1 × c1)↦({ s0 } ×(c2 ` s0))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c3)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cxp.s(s0, c1, c1)
}

blocks.name: homaf
blocks.content: Functionality of the disjointified hom-set function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Jan-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm homaf(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wf(c0, cxp(c1, c1), cpw(cxp(cxp(c1, c1), universe))))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(choma, c2))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, ccat))
} = {
  fmpt3d(hs0, c0, cxp(c1, c1), cpw(cxp(cxp(c1, c1), universe)), cxp(csn(cv(hs0)), cfv(cfv(chom, c2), cv(hs0))), w0)
  homafval(hs0, c0, c1, cfv(chom, c2), c2, w0)
  eqid(cfv(chom, c2))
  sylibr(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(c1, c1))), wcel(cxp(csn(cv(hs0)), cfv(cfv(chom, c2), cv(hs0))), cpw(cxp(cxp(c1, c1), universe))), wss(cxp(csn(cv(hs0)), cfv(cfv(chom, c2), cv(hs0))), cxp(cxp(c1, c1), universe)))
  sylancl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(c1, c1))), wss(cxp(csn(cv(hs0)), cfv(cfv(chom, c2), cv(hs0))), cxp(cxp(c1, c1), universe)), wss(csn(cv(hs0)), cxp(c1, c1)), wss(cfv(cfv(chom, c2), cv(hs0)), universe))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(c1, c1)), wss(csn(cv(hs0)), cxp(c1, c1)))
  snssi(cv(hs0), cxp(c1, c1))
  ssv(cfv(cfv(chom, c2), cv(hs0)))
  xpss12(csn(cv(hs0)), cxp(c1, c1), cfv(cfv(chom, c2), cv(hs0)), universe)
  elpw(cxp(csn(cv(hs0)), cfv(cfv(chom, c2), cv(hs0))), cxp(cxp(c1, c1), universe))
  xpex(csn(cv(hs0)), cfv(cfv(chom, c2), cv(hs0)))
  snex(cv(hs0))
  fvex(cfv(chom, c2), cv(hs0))
  diff.hs0.c(cxp(c1, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(cpw(cxp(cxp(c1, c1), universe)))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm homaf(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0 :(c1 × c1)→ P(((c1 × c1)× 𝕌))))
  ⊣ c0 =(HomA ` c2)
  ⊣ c1 =(Base ` c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ Cat)
} = {
  fmpt3d(hs0, c0, (c1 × c1), P(((c1 × c1)× 𝕌)), ({ hs0 } ×((Hom ` c2)` hs0)), w0)
  homafval(hs0, c0, c1, (Hom ` c2), c2, w0)
  eqid((Hom ` c2))
  sylibr((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(c1 × c1)), ({ hs0 } ×((Hom ` c2)` hs0))∈ P(((c1 × c1)× 𝕌)), ({ hs0 } ×((Hom ` c2)` hs0))⊆((c1 × c1)× 𝕌))
  sylancl((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(c1 × c1)), ({ hs0 } ×((Hom ` c2)` hs0))⊆((c1 × c1)× 𝕌), { hs0 } ⊆(c1 × c1), ((Hom ` c2)` hs0)⊆ 𝕌)
  adantl(w0, hs0 ∈(c1 × c1), { hs0 } ⊆(c1 × c1))
  snssi(hs0, (c1 × c1))
  ssv(((Hom ` c2)` hs0))
  xpss12({ hs0 }, (c1 × c1), ((Hom ` c2)` hs0), universe)
  elpw(({ hs0 } ×((Hom ` c2)` hs0)), ((c1 × c1)× 𝕌))
  xpex({ hs0 }, ((Hom ` c2)` hs0))
  snex(hs0)
  fvex((Hom ` c2), hs0)
  diff.hs0.c((c1 × c1))
  diff.hs0.c(P(((c1 × c1)× 𝕌)))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}

blocks.name: homaval
blocks.content: Value of the disjointified hom-set function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Jan-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm homaval(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), cxp(csn(cop(c0, c2)), co(c0, c3, c2))))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(choma, c4))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, ccat))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(chom, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c5))
} = {
  syl5eq(co(c0, c1, c2), cxp(csn(cop(c0, c2)), co(c0, c3, c2)), cfv(c1, cop(c0, c2)), w0)
  df-ov(c0, c1, c2)
  fvmptd(hs0, c1, cop(c0, c2), cxp(csn(cop(c0, c2)), co(c0, c3, c2)), cxp(c5, c5), cxp(csn(cv(hs0)), cfv(c3, cv(hs0))), universe, w0)
  homafval(hs0, c1, c5, c3, c4, w0)
  xpeq12d(csn(cv(hs0)), cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), csn(cop(c0, c2)), co(c0, c3, c2), wa(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), cop(c0, c2))))
  sneqd(cv(hs0), cop(c0, c2), wa(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), cop(c0, c2))))
  syl6eqr(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), co(c0, c3, c2), cfv(c3, cop(c0, c2)), wa(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), cop(c0, c2))))
  fveq2d(c3, cv(hs0), cop(c0, c2), wa(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), cop(c0, c2))))
  simpr(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), cop(c0, c2)))
  df-ov(c0, c3, c2)
  opelxpd(c0, c2, c5, c5, w0)
  a1i(w0, wcel(cxp(csn(cop(c0, c2)), co(c0, c3, c2)), universe))
  xpex(csn(cop(c0, c2)), co(c0, c3, c2))
  snex(cop(c0, c2))
  ovex(c0, c3, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cop(c0, c2))
  diff.hs0.c(cxp(csn(cop(c0, c2)), co(c0, c3, c2)))
  diff.hs0.c(cxp(c5, c5))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm homaval(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[c1]c2)=({ < c0, c2 > } ×(c0[c3]c2)))
  ⊣ c1 =(HomA ` c4)
  ⊣ c5 =(Base ` c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ Cat)
  ⊣ c3 =(Hom ` c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c5)
} = {
  syl5eq((c0[c1]c2), ({ < c0, c2 > } ×(c0[c3]c2)), (c1 ` < c0, c2 >), w0)
  df-ov(c0, c1, c2)
  fvmptd(hs0, c1, < c0, c2 >, ({ < c0, c2 > } ×(c0[c3]c2)), (c5 × c5), ({ hs0 } ×(c3 ` hs0)), universe, w0)
  homafval(hs0, c1, c5, c3, c4, w0)
  xpeq12d({ hs0 }, (c3 ` hs0), { < c0, c2 > }, (c0[c3]c2), (w0 ∧ hs0 = < c0, c2 >))
  sneqd(hs0, < c0, c2 >, (w0 ∧ hs0 = < c0, c2 >))
  syl6eqr((c3 ` hs0), (c0[c3]c2), (c3 ` < c0, c2 >), (w0 ∧ hs0 = < c0, c2 >))
  fveq2d(c3, hs0, < c0, c2 >, (w0 ∧ hs0 = < c0, c2 >))
  simpr(w0, hs0 = < c0, c2 >)
  df-ov(c0, c3, c2)
  opelxpd(c0, c2, c5, c5, w0)
  a1i(w0, ({ < c0, c2 > } ×(c0[c3]c2))∈ 𝕌)
  xpex({ < c0, c2 > }, (c0[c3]c2))
  snex(< c0, c2 >)
  ovex(c0, c3, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(< c0, c2 >)
  diff.hs0.c(({ < c0, c2 > } ×(c0[c3]c2)))
  diff.hs0.c((c5 × c5))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
}

blocks.name: elhoma
blocks.content: Value of the disjointified hom-set function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Jan-2017.)

thm elhoma(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wbr(c0, co(c1, c2, c3), c4), wa(wceq(c0, cop(c1, c3)), wcel(c4, co(c1, c5, c3)))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(choma, c6))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(cbs, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, ccat))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(chom, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c7))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c7))
} = {
  syl6bb(w0, wbr(c0, co(c1, c2, c3), c4), wa(wceq(c0, cop(c1, c3)), wcel(c4, co(c1, c5, c3))), wbr(c0, cxp(csn(cop(c1, c3)), co(c1, c5, c3)), c4))
  breqd(c0, co(c1, c2, c3), c4, cxp(csn(cop(c1, c3)), co(c1, c5, c3)), w0)
  homaval(c1, c2, c3, c5, c6, c7, w0)
  bitri(wbr(c0, cxp(csn(cop(c1, c3)), co(c1, c5, c3)), c4), wa(wceq(c0, cop(c1, c3)), wcel(c4, co(c1, c5, c3))), wa(wcel(c0, csn(cop(c1, c3))), wcel(c4, co(c1, c5, c3))))
  brxp(c0, csn(cop(c1, c3)), co(c1, c5, c3), c4)
  anbi1i(wcel(c0, csn(cop(c1, c3))), wcel(c4, co(c1, c5, c3)), wceq(c0, cop(c1, c3)))
  elsn2(c0, cop(c1, c3))
  opex(c1, c3)

blocks.name: elhomai
blocks.content: Produce an arrow from a morphism. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Jan-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm elhomai(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(cop(c0, c1), co(c0, c2, c1), c3))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(choma, c4))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, ccat))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(chom, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, co(c0, c6, c1)))
} = {
  mpbir2and(w0, wbr(cop(c0, c1), co(c0, c2, c1), c3), wceq(cop(c0, c1), cop(c0, c1)), wcel(c3, co(c0, c6, c1)))
  eqidd(cop(c0, c1), w0)
  elhoma(cop(c0, c1), c0, c2, c1, c3, c6, c4, c5, w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm elhomai(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → < c0, c1 >[(c0[c2]c1)]c3)
  ⊣ c2 =(HomA ` c4)
  ⊣ c5 =(Base ` c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ Cat)
  ⊣ c6 =(Hom ` c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈(c0[c6]c1))
} = {
  mpbir2and(w0, < c0, c1 >[(c0[c2]c1)]c3, < c0, c1 > = < c0, c1 >, c3 ∈(c0[c6]c1))
  eqidd(< c0, c1 >, w0)
  elhoma(< c0, c1 >, c0, c2, c1, c3, c6, c4, c5, w0)
}

blocks.name: elhomai2
blocks.content: Produce an arrow from a morphism. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Jan-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm elhomai2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cotp(c0, c1, c2), co(c0, c3, c1)))

  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}

thm cdaf(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((codA |` c0): c0 → c1)
  ⊣ c0 =(Arrow ` c2)
  ⊣ c1 =(Base ` c2)
} = {
  mpbir2an(((codA |` c0): c0 → c1), (codA |` c0)[Fn]c0, ∀(hs0 ∈ c0,((codA |` c0)` hs0)∈ c1))
  mp2an((codA |` c0)[Fn]c0, codA[Fn]𝕌, c0 ⊆ 𝕌)
  mpbir(codA[Fn]𝕌, (2nd ∘ 1st)[Fn]𝕌)
  mp2an((2nd ∘ 1st)[Fn]𝕌, 2nd[Fn]𝕌, (1st : 𝕌 → 𝕌))
  ax-mp(2nd[Fn]𝕌, (2nd : 𝕌 ↠ 𝕌))
  fo2nd()
  fofn(c2nd, universe, universe)
  ax-mp((1st : 𝕌 → 𝕌), (1st : 𝕌 ↠ 𝕌))
  fo1st()
  fof(c1st, universe, universe)
  fnfco(c2nd, universe, c1st, universe)
  fneq1i(ccoda, universe, (2nd ∘ 1st))
  df-coda()
  ssv(c0)
  fnssres(ccoda, universe, c0)
  rgen(hs0, c0, ((codA |` c0)` hs0)∈ c1)
  eqeltrd(((codA |` c0)` hs0), c1, (codA ` hs0), hs0 ∈ c0)
  fvres(hs0, c0, ccoda)
  arwcd(hs0, c0, c1, c2)
  ffnfv(hs0, (codA |` c0), c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c((codA |` c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}
